content: simple elongated slipped stitches bring colors to life in this easy-to-knit hat stitched in caron chunky cupcake this adorable hat is worked in the round with a fold-over brim stitched in simple 1 x 1 ribbing the body highlights color changes by slipping elongated stitches that pull the colors up from below making them stand out against the stripes to create a subtle plaid effect with rich texture the included pom pom is the finishing touch that makes this a speedy 1-ball project materials caron® chunky cupcake™ 3 5 oz/100 g 126 yds/138 m cotton candy 23023 1 ball or 104 yds/95 m size one size to fit adult approx 21 -22 53 5-56 cm head circumference
